summary: A small mod that redoes most of the vampire\'s race features. More powerful when fed vs. when you go hungry. Minor ability and spell changes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g2/shades_twilight/Title.png[/IMG]

This mod is not compatible with other mods that do the same thing. (Texture mods will work)

This is a small mod that changes how vampires work within Skyrim. Instead of being weaker when fed, you will now be more powerful and grow weaker as you progress to later stages of hunger. This also takes away the gimpy feel of vampires while at the same time maintaining balance. [/center]

[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g2/shades_twilight/readMe.png[/IMG]
If your game is not registering the change or you are experiencing a health regeneration bug, please download the new update. When you go in game, most of the time feeding will make the game register the changes. If this does not reset it for you, you will have to cure yourself from vampirism and become a vampire again. Here is a very easy way to do it! 

I included optional files for Nexus users to allow you to do the process in-game:
To Cure Vampirism: Have the optional BAT files installed and type \"bat unvampme\" into the console. To give yourself Sanguine Vampiris type \"bat vampme\" into the console, or download this mod which gives you a potion to automatically become a vampire with no wait time: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8918]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8918[/url]

[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g2/shades_twilight/Install.png[/IMG]
Download with NMM, Install the file. For manual install download and unzip and put the file in your Data folder or merge the Data folder in the zip file into your own Data folder.

[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g2/shades_twilight/Uninstall.png[/IMG]
Uninstall with NMM or just delete the file.

[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g2/shades_twilight/updates.png[/IMG]
[b]Initial 1.0 Release[/b]: (02/09/2012)
[b]Update 1.1 (02/09/2012)[/b]: Bug fixes so that bonus values apply properly. Changed Vampric Drain cost.
[b]Update 1.2 (2/12/2012)[/b]: Bug fix for health regeneration for some users. Make sure to read above. Also changed some of the wording of the transitions. Balanced out Weakness of Fire.
[b]Future Plans[/b]: To add a toggle-able ability to engage sun-damage. Allowing for a completely *optional* hard mode vampire. Will always do hotfixes for bugs.

[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g2/shades_twilight/changes.png[/IMG]
[color=orange][b]~-~-~-~-~-~ General Changes ~-~-~-~-~-~[/b][/color]
All vampire powers changed to lesser powers. Meaning you can now use them more than once per day.
Champion of the Night: 20% Speechcraft bonus, 25% Illusion, Waterbreathing
Hunter\'s Sight: Made toggle-able (can turn off and on, no cooldown). In the future Detect Life will be added.

[color=orange][b]~-~-~-~-~-~ Changes by Stage ~-~-~-~-~-~[/b][/color]
Weakness to Sunlight
Stage 1: 10% slower recovery of Magicka, Health and Stamina 
Stage 2: 25% slower recovery of Magicka, Health and Stamina +15 damage to each
Stage 3: 75% slower recovery of Magicka, Health and Stamina +30 damage to each
Stage 4: No recovery of Magicka, Health or Stamina +60 damage to each
----------
Vampiric Strength
Stage 1: 20% Unarmed Bonus, 10% Destruction and Weapon Bonus
Stage 2: 15% Unarmed Bonus, 8% Destruction and Weapon Bonus
Stage 3: 10% Unarmed Bonus, 5% Destruction and Weapon Bonus
Stage 4: 5% Unarmed Bonus
----------
Vampiric Drain Spell (Destruction Magic)
Stage 1: Absorbs 20 Health
Stage 2: Absorbs 15 Health
Stage 3: Absorbs 10 Health
Stage 4: Absorbs 5 Health
----------
Weakness to Fire
Stage 1: 15%
Stage 2: 30%
Stage 3: 45%
Stage 4: 60%
----------
Resistance to Frost
Stage 1: 100%
Stage 2: 75%
Stage 3: 50%
Stage 4: 0%

[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g2/shades_twilight/Credits.png[/IMG]
Please do not edit or redistribute my work without my permission. If you like it please endorse.

[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g2/shades_twilight/othermods.png[/IMG]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3374]Vampire Eye Fix[/url] (gives female human characters vampire eyes properly)

[color=orange][b]Face Mods / Body / Eye / Hair Mods[/b][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]CBBE Female Body[/url]

author: AlyssaRamsey

files.name: ARs Vampires Version 1-1
files.changelogHtml:
Hotfix for a few bugs reported. Bonus stats should now register in game OK.
Made Vampiric Seduction a lesser power (can be used more than once per day).
Reduced cost of Vampiric Drain.

files.name: ARs Vampires Version 1-2
files.changelogHtml:
Found solution to bug for steam users.
Changed transistion descriptions to match mod.
Balanced Weakness to Fire
